mapper.select: SELECT c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_time competition_time, c.competition_name competition_name, c.competition_content competition_content, c.competition_site competition_site, c.competition_state competition_state, f.file_id file_id, f.file_name file_name, f.file_path file_path FROM t_competition c LEFT JOIN t_file f ON c.competition_id = f.competition_id WHERE c.competition_id = #{v}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_competition(competition_id, college_id, competition_name, competition_state, competition_content, competition_type, competition_time, competition_level, competition_site, competition_people_sum) VALUES (#{competitionId} , #{college.collegeId}, #{competitionName}, #{competitionState}, #{competitionContent}, #{competitionType}, #{competitionTime}, #{competitionLevel}, #{competitionSite}, #{competitionPeopleSum})
mapper.select: SELECT c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_time competition_time, c.competition_name competition_name, c.competition_content competition_content, c.competition_site competition_site, c.competition_level competition_level, c.competition_type competition_type, c.competition_people_sum competition_people_sum,tc.college_name college_name, u.university_name university_name FROM t_competition c LEFT JOIN t_college tc ON c.college_id = tc.college_id LEFT JOIN t_university u ON tc.university_id = u.university_id

SELECT u.user_id user_id, u.user_className user_className, u.period period, u.name name, u.user_name user_name, u.phone phone, u.email email,c.college_id college_id, c.college_name college_name FROM t_user_competition uc LEFT JOIN t_user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_college c ON c.college_id = u.college_id WHERE uc.competition_id = #{v}

SELECT uc.date dt, c.competition_name competition_name, c.competition_type competition_type, c.competition_id competition_id,c.competition_people_sum competition_people_sum, c.competition_state competition_state FROM t_user_competition uc LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON uc.competition_id = c.competition_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{v}
SELECT competition_id, competition_name, competition_people_sum FROM t_competition WHERE competition_people_sum > 1
